1. root
  2. subsystem=infinispan

  4. cache
  5. component=partition-handling

Management API Reference for component=partition-handling

The partition handling configuration for distributed and replicated caches.

Attributes (1)

  • availability - Indicates the current availability of the cache.
    Type STRING
    Where is the attribute stored? runtime
    Access Type metric
    Stability Level default
    Raw DMR model 
    
{
    "type" : {
        "TYPE_MODEL_VALUE" : "STRING"
    },
    "description" : "Indicates the current availability of the cache.",
    "expressions-allowed" : false,
    "required" : true,
    "nillable" : false,
    "min-length" : 1,
    "max-length" : 2147483647,
    "stability" : "default",
    "access-type" : "metric",
    "storage" : "runtime",
    "restart-required" : null,
    "capability-reference" : null
}

Operations (1)

  • force-available - Forces a cache with degraded availability to become available.
    Raw DMR model 
    
{
    "operation-name" : "force-available",
    "description" : "Forces a cache with degraded availability to become available.",
    "request-properties" : {},
    "reply-properties" : {},
    "stability" : "default",
    "read-only" : false,
    "runtime-only" : true
}
